file_content.text: Oteg lives to fight another day--through cowardice, of course. Now you're all alone.
So much for Oteg. With his death, the Republic's little misadventure here comes to an end.
I'd hoped to finish you myself, but Lord Vanithrast beat me to your position.
There won't be much left after he's finished. Pity. I so enjoy collecting trophies....
All vessels, retreat. Repeat: All vessels retreat immediately. Over.
Cruisers Nova and Farstar--pull in the rear guard. The enemy's taking the bait.
Draw the enemy fleet into the Maelstrom. Buy our friends more time....
Rear guard's taking heavy fire! Cruisers Nova and Farstar--close that gap!
The Onasi's gone. Concentrate firepower on the Emperor's Glory! Don't let it through!
Imperial bombers strafing the Telos. All fighter wings, break and attack. Fire at--aaaaah!
The Scarred Man followed you. Hatred. Master Oteg in flames. Mercy is the Jedi's defense.
Ha! Caught the enemy on a caf break. Prison defenses might as well be made of flimsiplast.
Find the security control center. Deactivate the internal safeguards. The computer system will reveal the Jedi prisoner's location.
My fleet will move in and provide any support you need. Good luck!
